Oh, just leave me alone! I haven't been able take a break all day because of Olivia!/n

Ifina will heal you if you're wounded. Although I might not look it, I'm a veteran Greenleaf Healer. Ahem! Well, I do sometimes confuse diarrhea remedies with constipation remedies... But it's a very trivial matter, so you don't have to worry about it. Now, where does it hurt?/n

The Greenleaf Healers treat any injured person, regardless of nationality, race, age, or gender. We are sometimes misunderstood for that, and it can put us in awkward situations, but we can't just leave the injured unattended, can we?/n
I've spent all the money I made from collecting and selling coral on drinking. Hic! That's why I'm penniless now. It's all because of wine./n
They say the Tutos are attacking the coral miners. I'll take all their pouches... I mean I'll punish name in the name of justice!/n

I came to buy some coral, but the price went up because they're harvesting less coral than before. We Matina merchants need to get them at a lower price if we're going to make enough profit. What to do...?/n

What's wrong with you? Don't tell me you don't know where you are! There was someone like you before. He said he didn't know where he was, or even WHO he was. Just to be on the safe side, I'll tell you that you're at the Coraleve Mine, where newbies come to mine coral and make some money./nWhat? Do I know you? How should I know who you are?/n

The guy next to me can sound rude, but that's because he wants everyone who comes to this Coral Mine to be successful. He says that you'll be successful if you know who you are, what you're doing, and where you are. Good luck!/n
Do you want to go to Blue Coral too? Cross the bridge and follow the road, and you can't miss it. It's a very lively place./n
The jewel coral is so beautiful! The brilliant colors and straight, beautiful branches! This is why everyone wants it!/n
Have you heard of the Lime Pieces before? They say they're all over the place... They seem to be pretty useful, and apparently a bunch of merchants are trying to buy them./n
They say the monument was erected to commemorate the ship Greenleaf's arrival. This is where the humans began their new history./n
Hehehe! Can you see the twin sisters at the Greenleaf over there? They're Ipina and Lupina, and they're beautiful like flowers. Every time I look at them, it feels like I'm young again./n

Oh, I followed to them here because they pay well, but I really can't stand next to them. They're always mumbling, making strange items, and digging up the dirt like a bunch of lunatics. If only I didn't need the money.../n

I came here after hearing a rumor that this is where you can secure a stable supply of coral. I'm quite satisfied because they're not that different from natural coral in terms of quality. One thing I don't like about it is that there's a Pikin, who doesn't belong with such beautiful coral./n
I came here to get some coral, and look at me now!
Damned monsters!/nGet out of here right now!
Can't you see that the kobolds are going berserk? Help us make them pay for it!
The coral is so beautiful even to a man like me. Of course, there are those who don't find it so beautiful, but fine cut coral is enough to make anyone love it./n
It's those horrible kobolds again! At this rate, we won't have any coral left at all!

Oh... The world is a big place, and there are many treasures!/nI'm Captain Jack Spenrowe, and I have traveled the whole world on the Black Coral! I see you're looking for the Lime too. Why not come with us? I think the Lime is hidden deep in the ocean! How about it?/n

In Blue Coral I recently saw a bunch of people going on a journey in search for the Lime just like you. I heard some stories about the Lime, but I'm not sure if there is really such a thing./nBut since you're at it, try to look for it as hard as you can. Even if you don't find the Lime, I'm sure you'll learn a lot in the process./n
Whew! This is unbelievable! Have you seen my husband? I'll make him regret pulling a stunt like this when he comes back home!/n
Oh, I don't know! This one is colorful... But that one is so cute! Which one should I take?/n(She looks at the dolls with dreamy eyes.)/nOh, pshaw! I'll take them both!/n
There are many hills in my hometown in the Northern Continent. Whenever I'm homesick, I come up here to make myself feel better. I want to go back to my hometown of Antalia.../n
My body feels really heavy. I can't even lift a finger.../n
Leave me alone! I don't want to do anything right now!/n
Oww! I can't move my body! It's like I have cramps all over!/n
Welcome to Blue Coral!/nThe bridge I'm standing on right now leads to the gate to North Blue Coral, so come on in. I hope you have a fun trip!/n
Are you going to Blue Coral too? Well, at least you won't be bored since I'm going to ask you a bunch of questions!/n
I'm on duty right now, so please don't talk to me unless it's urgent./n
It's very boring standing guard, and even more so when your partner is a simpleton. What did I ever do to deserve this?/n
There're a lot of coral in the ocean there, but how will I mine the coral when the water is deeper than my height and I can't swim?/nPeople here have no regard for short ladies like me!/n
This is where the Queen of the Seirens resides./n
Be careful! There are more Marinebees that will attack you!/n
I'll protect Queen Rudivari as long as I live./n
I won't tolerate any rude behavior towards the queen./n
Is Enesera okay? She went to get some help./n
Sirben prefers an open plaza where she can see people over her stifling official residence./n

Sirbenn thinks that as the Chief, she must see how people live in Blue Coral and listen to them./nShe comes to this plaza every day so she can feel that she's a member of the community and learn about what people really need./n
I gotta excavate and do some research.../nI'm busy as a bee!
Do you want to go to Duval Highland? I'll send you there as quickly and accurately as I can./n
We're seriously short of materials for processing coral.
We're having great weather today. It's a perfect day to start an adventure!/n
I'll be rich when I find the Lime. Rich!
Why are the relics always hidden in the middle of nowhere? I really wish they were in the middle of downtown or in my front yard!/nWhy did you have to make me come all the way here? Ugh!
Dang. Those evil Balaur! They completely destroyed my house!
Haha! I guess I'll have to cut my fingernails. It looks like people are afraid of my appearance./nI'm actually a nice Keiger.
I'm not scared of those Balaur!/nBut I am worried about my mother...
It looks like it contained some supplies for the soldiers who were fighting the Balaur.
The continent was divided.../n/nThe Life Fragments were scattered all over the land once again.../nThou shalt purify and stabilize all with the power of the Lime.
We have removed all traces of the shipwreck, but it's not enough.
What is this box doing here? I don't like the looks of this...
Hehehehe! I almost starved to death in the box! Hehehehe! Why am I laughing?! Hehehehe!
The Seiren's Tear must be in the ocean, right? I want it, but I really hate water!
Oh no! Is my love Ridwin alright?
The place is crawling with Marinebees. I hope the Seirens are alright. I'll protect them.
Your weapon is just about only the thing that can protect your life out there, so don't hesitate to come see me if you suspect your weapon is rusted./n
Come see us at Greenleaf when you're hurt or tired!/n

I see you're a traveler. Do you want to take a break here? /n /nIf you can't craft items anymore because you did it too much, you can recover by resting at an inn. Of course, you'll need to pay for it. Money doesn't grow on trees after all./n
Are you here to repair your equipment? Then show me right now!/n
Make sure you come to the Greenleaf Healers if you run into a problem while traveling. I'll help you as much as I can./n
The fastest way to become the best warrior in the Orta Continent is to use your sword and shield as effectively as you can. I know that very skill./nDo you want to learn?

Magic may seem complicated and difficult, but it's actually a rather enjoyable process of reading the flow of the Mana in the air that's invisible to others./nDo you want me to teach you how to read the Mana Stream?
Your friends can use their swords on your enemies without having to look over their shoulder because they know we Clerics have their back./nDo you wish to you learn Healing Skills?
It's very thrilling to sneak up behind your enemy in total darkness./nDo you want to learn that skill from me?

The road to becoming a mage is so long it can seem endless, but there is an end to every road a man takes. Although we can postpone the end of our journey by going around, there is no way to avoid the end./n
While hard work is important to control mana at will, your natural talent is equally important./n

Blithe blessings! Thank you for visiting the Nysis Heritage Cathedral. Are you here to pray to the goddess? Or can I help you with something else?/nThe Goddess Nysis watches over everyone on Orta, so don't hesitate to ask me for any kind of aid./n

A dotted skirt yesterday, sleek two-tone vest today, and pretty Rabbit headdress for tomorrow.../nA tailor is happiest when he sees the grayish streets come to life with his colorful clothes!/nAnd you can have this pleasure if you learn some skills from me.
Nothing is more worthwhile than preparing hearty food with the best and hard to find ingredients for those I love./nLearn Chef Skills, and you'll also learn the joy of sharing.

The sword and shield will become like a part of your body as you keep them at your side on a long adventure as a warrior. Every adventurer who embarks on an adventure around here takes my weapons and armors before they go! How about it?/nWill you learn the Blacksmith Skill from me then?
The dungeon adventure is just endless!/nIf you need money, consider exploring the dungeon.
Hi! It's nice to meet you! My name is Siri.
I sell Captain Tools, with which you can make the most powerful weapons! Take a look right now!/n
What are you looking for? I'm sure you'll find it here!/n

An experienced warrior should be able to pick his weapon according to the level of his skill. If you use a weapon that's too powerful or too weak for your skills, you won't be able to tap your weapon's full potential./n

People normally think that you must be skilled at attacking to be a good warrior, but knowing how to defend yourself is equally important. Why don't you pick out some armor while keeping that in mind?/n
Do you need a weapon repaired? Show it to me; I'll make it look as good as new./n

The furnace must never go out at a smithy. Having no fire means you're not working, and when that happens you'll forget the skills you've worked so hard to cultivate. You won't have the same skill when you light up the fire again./n

I see you're a traveler. Do you want to take a break here? /n /nIf you can't craft items anymore because you did it too much, you can recover by resting at an inn. Of course, you'll need to pay for it. Money doesn't grow on trees after all./n
You should never buy the items that Matina Merchants are selling at low prices. Chances are there are defects!
Those Bagdardun Guild jerks are so annoying!
If you need something repaired show it to me right now! I'll fix it as soon as possible./n
Come to Greenleaf if you're hurt or in danger. We'll help you as much as we can./n
If you use your weapon often enough, it will get dull no matter how carefully you handle it. That's why adventurers like you need blacksmiths like me./n
We Greenleaf Healers are everywhere, including Blue Coral, the Blue Coral Forest, the Coraleve Mine, the North First-Aid Station, and the Excavation Site./n
Nothing is worse than having a broken weapon, so it's crucial to have your weapon repaired whenever you have the chance./n
I think the more remotely located you are, the more you need Greenleaf's help. Make sure you ask for our help when you find yourself in danger!/n
The fastest way to become the best warrior in the Orta Continent is to use your sword and shield as effectively as you can. I know that very skill./nDo you want to learn?
It's very thrilling to sneak up behind your enemy in total darkness./nDo you want to learn that skill from me?

Magic may seem complicated and difficult, but it's actually a rather enjoyable process of reading the flow of the Mana in the air that's invisible to others./nDo you want me to teach you how to read the Mana Stream?
That your friends can use their swords on enemies without having to look over their shoulders is because they know we Clerics have their back./nWill you learn Healing Skills?
Nothing is more worthwhile than preparing hearty food with rare ingredients for those I love./nLearn Chef Skills and you'll also learn the joys of sharing.

The sword and shield will become like a part of your body as you keep them at your side on a long adventure as a warrior. Every adventurer who embarks on an adventure around here takes my weapons and armors before they go! How about it?/nWill you learn the Blacksmith Skill from me then?

A dotted skirt yesterday, sleek two-tone vest today, and pretty Rabbit headdress for tomorrow.../nA tailor is happiest when he sees the grayish streets come to life with his colorful clothes!/nAnd you can have this pleasure if you learn some skills from me.
Do you know your pet's dark secret?/n

Are you worried that won't have anything to wear because you have tailor's clothes when you're a chef? Come see me! If you have clothes that don't suit your job, I'll trade them for the clothes you need for your Trade Class!/n
I can't pick coral because of the stupid fish!
You'd better keep an eye on those Tutos; they're really hostile to humans.
I'm sorry, but please don't talk to me. My partner is a really uptight warrior, you see./n
I'm sorry, but please don't talk to me. My partner is a really uptight warrior, you see./n
I'm sorry, but please don't talk to me. My partner is a really uptight warrior, you see./n
I'm sorry, but please don't talk to me. My partner is a really uptight warrior, you see./n
Welcome to Twin Clover Guild Green Coral Branch!
Welcome to Twin Clover Guild Blue Coral Branch!
Welcome to Twin Clover Guild Ancient Historical Site Excavation Site Branch.
Welcome to Twin Clover Guild Green Coral Branch!
Welcome to Twin Clover Guild Blue Coral Branch!
I have all the ingredients you need for making nutritious and delicious dishes!/n
I have all the ingredients you need for making nutritious and delicious dishes!/n
I have a wide range of tailoring tools that can transform any worn out clothes into garments fit for a king! Needle and thread are all you need! Take a look around!/n
Ahem! Having a big bag means you have a big heart!
Welcome to Twin Clover Guild Red Coral Branch!

You can't have a healthy body without a healthy mind. Calming your mind by watching water boil after a hard day's work and smelling the sweet aroma of tea can help you train your mind./nYou can also have a healthy mind if you learn Tea Ceremony Master Skills.
Welcome to the Animal Farmyard! Woof!

My name is Husky Rain, and I'm in charge of guarding the Blue Coral Farm./n/nI came here from the West Tumbara Plains because I love the clean air and blue ocean. I'm living an easy life in this beautiful place, and I think I did the right thing coming here./nI want you to get what you're looking for in this farm too.
The weather is really nice today./nI hope you have a great trip!
Is this the life of a blacksmith? It's my destiny to spend the rest of my life swinging a hammer!
Doesn't this look delicious? I'd give anything to have a bite of it!
Welcome to the Animal Farmyard! Woof!
Come see me if you want to make some clothes.
If you use magic properly, I'm sure you'll find something interesting.
I have this feeling that a good news will come from the north. Traveler, haven't you ever had a feeling like that? I mean some kind of strange premonition that keeps you awake all night./n
Welcome! I'm Lichil, and I'm the leader of my nomadic tribe./n
I serve Lichil, the patriarch of this tribe./n
What is your business here? Please behave yourself in Lichil's presence./n
Hey! Have you ever ridden a Winger before? Why don't you ride one over the Highland? Find out how fast and exciting it is!/n
I train my body every day. Since you travel long distances, you might want to keep training your body because you never know what's going to happen in a remote area./n

Haha! You're here because you fell in love with our Nomadic Tribe's Wingers, aren't you? I can understand. Our Wingers are faster and stronger than those from Hamudan's tribe or Majerona, the Central City of the Highland./n
Those city folks won't understand this because they always like new things, but my antiques are priceless. But then again, I'll sell them to you at a special price, so take a look around./n
My dad told me not to go into the forest. I really want to know what's in there.../n
We've got a serious problem. I need all the merchants here so we can leave./n
The Leader of the Merchant Association is having a lot of headaches nowadays. Is there any way I can help?

It didn't work out as I planned! I can't believe I'm here killing time because of an invasion that was supposed to end exactly 48 hours, 35 minutes, and 23 seconds ago! /n48 hours, 35 minutes, and 23 second and no less!/n
I see you're from another country. I'm part of a delegation from the Valkaras Kingdom. I was sent to Duval Highland on a business./n
I'm the East Beacon Guard Captain of the Valkaras Kingdom's Duval Highland! What do you want?/n
Duval Highland is a territory of the Valkaras Kingdom./n
I really don't understand why they're all looking for the Lime./n
Just a little longer and I can finally eat! What kinds of food would be waiting for me at the cafeteria?/n

No one is taking their guard duty seriously, and they're all talking nonsense about something called the Lime. I even have one guard who's only concern is today's menu.../nI'm starting to get worried./n

A friend of mine is standing guard on the Road of the Ascender. If you came from the east, you might have seen him on your way here. But he said there's something wrong over there. I wonder what's going on there?/n
The Beacon Tower helps us take immediate measures in emergency situations./n
You look like you're from the east. Was the road too curvy, sloped, and lengthy for you? Newcomers to this place tend to look really tired./n
We should always have firewood and oil ready so we can light up the beacon any time we need to./n
Hmm... I see you're not from Valkaras. I hate to say it, but I think there are too many travelers here./n
They say that the Schiers started some strange experiment at the South Port./n
You don't look like you're from Valkaras. What brings you here?/n
From here on the Duval Highland is a territory of the Valkaras Kingdom./n
If you came from the West Tumbara Plains, it might be hard for you to adapt to Duval Highland because it's quite different. Why is that?/nYou'll know if you follow the road.

You'd better be careful not to slip. There are lots of slopes here, and many travelers who are new to this place get hurt because they're not used to this type of terrain. One wrong step could make you fall over the cliff and cost your life!/n
The end of the hill isn't visible from here. You'll have to climb a very curvy road for a long time./n

Are you also a traveler searching for the Lime? Honestly, I feel sorry for all those people searching for it because I doubt it really exists. But then again, if you're going to do it, you should give your best anyway. Keep up the good work!/n
Wow! It must have been very hard for you to come all this way! You're almost there, so keep it up!/n
Do you really think there is such a thing as the Lime? I don't really know, but since you're already on a journey you'd better do your best so you don't have to regret it later./n

Oh... A cute little Pikin Merchant is running a store nearby, and every time I go there, I keep telling myself not to buy anything today... But after getting off work I always end up buying something on my way home./n
There is a little Pikin Merchant nearby. I've heard a rumor that the merchant's carriage was nearly destroyed. I don't know the details, but I'm afraid something bad will happen to our kingdom./n
Go down this road, and you'll see the place where the Pikin had an accident. Be careful though; something might be happening near there./n
Keep it up! You're almost to the top! Cross that bridge over there, you'll see Highland City and the nomads./n
I see you made it all the way to the bridge. It leads to the center of Duval Highland. Since you're here, you should take a tour of this place./n
When you're crossing the bridge, don't look down. The fear of falling will make it seem longer than it really is, so you should just look straight ahead./n
Don't give up now! You must stop them no matter what!/n
I think I'm going to die.../n
I don't care! I'll run away! Don't talk to me! I'm busy!/n
I've been traveling around the world selling my wares, but I was never scared like I am now!/n
I can't die in a place like this! You have to keep it up even though it's hard!/n
I'm Hamudan, the leader of this nomadic nribe. I don't know why you came here, but try to stay out of trouble./n
Have you ever tried Goty Milk? It's savory and thick. It's a perfect food because it's very nutritious! Don't you want to try it?/n
Everyone looks down on me because I'm so quiet and feeble. It's all because my legs aren't in good shape. You've seen it, haven't you traveler?/n
Oh, I'm so hungry! I can't get a job because I'm still too young... How will I earn my bread today?/n
What do you want? Oh! You're here to learn the secret of my beauty, right? But I can't teach you that for free!/n
It's hard making a living in this world, but something good will happen to you some day. I know it./n
Traveler, do I look fat or out of style?/n
She's my only daughter. I'm so worried about her that I can hardly concentrate on my work... Sigh... You'll understand why I'm sighing like this when you have a child of your own./n
Unlike other settlements like Majerona, this is a nomadic tribe. Newcomers are shocked when they see us./n
Hamudan tries very hard to preserve the nomads' traditions and way of life. Humadan always knows what's best./n
It's so much work tending the stock that I would still be short of manpower even if I had ten of me. Whew!/n
There is a friend I would like to see./n
There are suspicious rumors circulating around. I wonder what's really going on?/n
Whew! The Wingers are so picky that even I have a hard time sometimes. You'd better be careful when handling them./n

Don't think that antiques are just worn out old things. Antiques sometimes tell you what the craftsman was thinking when he made it, and what the society was like at that time. They can even tell us where we came from./n /nWould you like to buy some? I can recommend something good to you./n

The person next to me is Hamudan, the leader of this Nomadic Tribe. Don't you think he looks so powerful and manly?/nHe's manly inside too. He may look a little scary and rough, but he's just an upright person. Try not to misjudge him./n
What brings you here? The chief is here, so behave yourself./n
You shouldn't distract a soldier on duty./n
I hope nothing bad happens today. I'm worried because some strange things have been happening nowadays./n
The beacon towers of the Valkaras Kingdom are always ready for any emergency./n
I see you're a traveler. What brings you here?/n
I'm glad nothing bad is happening to the Highland, but it can be very boring for someone like me who has to stand guard all day long. Isn't there anything interesting?/n
I've seen lots of people looking for something called the Lime. Are you one of them?/n
People from other countries say that it's hard to get around because of all the hills, but I don't find them all that difficult. Maybe it's because I grew up here./n

I've been training hard every day ever since I was little so I can become a strong guard, but now all my powerful battle skills seem useless. I guess we're better off without having to fight a war though./n
Arrrrgh! It hurts! I can't move because I hurt my leg. I want to get out of this terrible place as soon as I can.../n
I need to go back and see the leader of the Merchant Association with my friends who were left behind here.../n
(It looks like he can't even talk because he's so badly wounded.)/n
Who are you? Oh, never mind who you are. Just help us!/n
I won't stop bleeding! Will I die like this?/n
I want to go see my friends in my hometown before I die... But at this rate I don't think that'll happen.../n
When I was first trapped here, I tried to escape several times, but I failed. Now the thought of seeing my family and friends again... I gave it up./n
Traveler, you look kind enough. Please get me out of here! I wan to go back to where my friends and colleagues are.../n
Oh, I would have just stayed in Constania if I'd known something like this would happen... Why did I have to here and suffer like this?/n
What was that? I'll try to listen, so speak up if you have something to say! I can't promise you that I'll give you the answer you want though./n
I see you're a Ground Watcher. What do you want from us Garonas?/n
I was wondering why I was feeling this strange energy earlier today. Now I know the energy is from you, stranger./n
You look like you're here to see the chief. You'd better not cause any trouble./n
What brings you to our Garona Nest? I don't like your dirty clothes, or the look on your face./n
Lately I've been seeing lots of people coming from other countries./n
There are lots of excellent medicinal herbs in this rugged highland that I call home. Do you want to take a look at them?/n
What brings you to this place? Be careful. A stranger like you wandering around can get into all kinds of trouble./n...Not that I care what happens to you.
Hmm... How many items did I lose this time? One, two... Oh, what brings you here today? I'm sorry, but I can't do business right now. Could you come back later?/n
Although the wounds I got during the invasion didn't heal, I can't close down my store. I'm trying to organize things again and open my business as soon as possible./n
Oh, I have no idea how I'm going make a living. I lost all my precious items... I'm still hurting because I was injured, but the fact that I can't open my store hurts even more./n
I was supposed to see a friend of mine in Hamudan's tribe./n
As long as my soldiers and I are standing guard, no enemies can get through the gate to the capital city./n

The Knights of Ishperman are well known for their bravery. Why don't you join the guild and make yourself famous in Orta Continent? You should be able to get some information about the Knight Guild in Ishperman./n
You could say this is the first checkpoint to the capital city. That's why I have to be the most friendly guard./n

It's been a little over a month since I was posted here as a guard, but I'm still making too many mistakes. Yesterday I forgot to patrol the area, and my boss raised hell. Maybe I'll be as good as the other guards after I get some more experience./n
Some people look down on us female soldiers, but Valkyrian women are every bit as brave as the men. You'll be sorry if you underestimate us./n
Ack! Don't sneak up on me like that! You woke me up! ...I wasn't dozing off while on duty or anything. But you startled me./n

I stayed in my hometown and become a soldier as you can see, but most of my friends went out to search for the Lime. Still, leaving home will be nothing but hardship, right? I tried to stop them, but they wouldn't listen./n
Anyone can enter Ishperman. Of course, we don't allow suspicious-looking people in./n

I don't hold any grudge against the nomads, but I still don't like how they avoid other people. I wish all the city folk and nomads could get along, especially since we're all from the same ancestors./n

Lynn from the legend of Valkyrians is my heroine. They say she never missed a target. I'm practicing my archery skills every day so I can be like her. Maybe that's why I'm known as the best archer among the Border Garrisons!/n
Some say the Prime Minister is right, but others say the King is right. But to us soldiers, protecting the kingdom is all that really matters./n
It's boring to stand here all by myself./n
Our cook's cooking skills are... Well, I won't say they're delicious. But then again, he prepares food for so many soldiers all by himself, so I can't really complain about the taste./n
Isn't it boring standing guard here? Well... When I think I'm bored, I would count the clouds in the sky and watch the Wingers that come near./n
I understand that the captain is serious about his job, but he's too obstinate about going by the rules. I wish he would relax just a little./n

Do you want to go to the capital city of Insuferman? Pass through this place, go west, and you should arrive at Ishperman. When you get there, you'll find yourself wanting to build a house there and settle down. You can count on it. Haha!/n
I went to visit Hamudan's nomadic tribe where my family is a little while ago, but my little sister Mei wouldn't even look at me. I think it's because she fell in love with one of the nomads./n
I've been hearing about these huge tracks appearing to the north. I've never seen them with my own eyes, but the travelers tell me that they're very strange./n
Have you ever seen the Four Beacon Towers in Duval Highland? As long as we have the beacon towers and border garrisons, our enemies won't even come close to Ishperman./n
Come back again later if you have something to tell me. I'm on duty now./n
Please check the disgusting Matina Merchants. How would I smuggle something when I'm this small? But you'll find some suspicious items if you search those giants. They're are as big as their greed./n
Please don't listen to those lying Pikins. I'm positive that behind their cute faces they're evil. Don't let their appearances fool you. Check their underwear if you have to./n
It looks like more people are trying to enter the capital city today. I got tired even before it was my turn to be inspected./n
I think I did the right thing coming to Duval Highland. The clean air makes me feel like I'm flying in the sky. This is a very unique experience that you can never have in low altitude regions./n
I want to become a great person who will lead the Valkaras./n
I'm training myself while traveling the world as Captain Kale taught me. I want to become a great warrior with lots of experience./n
Actually, I want to volunteer to join the Knight Guild in the capital city, but I'm not skilled enough and I don't even have much experience. That's why I've volunteered to work at the garrison./n

Hahahaha! A business trip always makes me happy because I can make pretty good money repairing soldiers' weapons all by myself without any competition. If you have any weapons you need repaired, show them to me and I'll repair them for you. Of course, you have to pay for it. Haha!/n

Protecting the Beacon Tower is our highest priority, but we also need to patrol the area constantly. The problem is that we're very short of soldiers. When will the reinforcements come from the capital?/n
Please don't touch the Beacon Tower./n
This is the Central Beacon Tower, and there are three more Beacon Towers. Where? Hehe! You'll know if you look around. Find them yourself./n

You want to know why we have these Beacon Towers? It's to notify the capital as quickly as possible during an enemy attack. They can see the lights of the towers all the way in the capital, so it's much faster than sending a messenger./n

The Beacon Towers can send different messages according to the predesignated signals./n /nFor instance, we might light up two stacks of firewood in the small beacon to say that a small army is approaching the Central Beacon Tower, or light up the large beacon in the middle and small beacon to the right when many soldiers are approaching the beacon tower. That kind of thing. Of course, those were just examples and not used in a real situation. The actual beacon signals are classified./n
The person next to me thinks he's a Beacon Tower tour guide. Look at him! He tries to tell everyone who passes through about the beacon towers!/n

A moment ago that man over there was screaming and running towards us like a madman. He was saying something about a monster in the Ancient Mountain. It's nonsense! He probably just saw a Unirex or something./n
You should be able to see Hardudin's Lake if you head north from here. It's the sacred place where Harudin is resting in peace, so behave yourself there./n
Follow this road to the west, and you'll see the Border Checkpoint./n
Are you searching for the Lime by any chance? Most of the people passing through here lately have been after the Lime./n

You're seriously mistaken if you think all we do is guard the beacon tower. We have to make sure there's firewood to light up the Beacon Tower in emergencies, and we're constantly patrolling the area./n
The monsters around here are driving me crazy! It's hard enough working as a guard, but now I have to kill them too. I wish I had two, no, TEN bodies!/n
Argh! My stomach has been hurting bad since this morning. Jack's medicine is a perfect cure for something like this.../n
They're accepting volunteers to help kill the monsters in the area, so I came here to volunteer./n
The nomads are excellent hunters, but I want to show them I'm not inferior to them. They'll recognize me if I catch some giant animals, right?/n
There are lots of useful medicinal herbs in Duval Highland. But you'd better be careful since there are some dangerous plants like the Whiptree and Tor./n
A little while ago it was a clear lake, but the water is dirty now. What do you think happened? We'd better take a look around one more time and let the others know./n
Young traveler, how do you like the southern wind in this highland?/n
Sometimes very strong gusts of wind blow over the Wind Highland. You'll understand what I'm talking about when you see how much the trees are bent./n
I've heard a rumor that there are ghosts in the Ebon Highland located southwest of here. It looks like no one's gone there since the nomads left... Isn't it creepy?/n

Did you just ask me how long the windmills have been there? Actually, I'm dying to know myself! Even the locals don't know when the windmills were built. All they know is that they've been around for a long time./n

It's really boring watching over the Beacon Tower all day long without even moving. Not only that, but the armor and weapons I'm wearing are really heavy. Sometimes I want to quit this job and start raising Wingers./n

Actually, one of the soldiers who's working with me likes it. She's very picky and cold, but that's what makes her attractive. Who is she? I can't tell you that. If I tell you who she is, she'll find out I have a crush on her before I'm ready to confess to her. Hahaha! I'll win her heart someday./n
What do you want from a guard on duty? We soldiers don't have too much free time. Passersby must think we're just a joke when they see a daydreaming soldier like him over there./n
You'll have a better chance of winning a battle if you know your opponent. For instance, you should have some antidotes ready when you're about to fight someone who uses poison./n
There is a Black Spider den southeast of here. Be careful; those spiders are very dangerous./n
If I were trying to attack this highland, my first target would be the Beacon Tower. That way I could stop the soldiers from signaling the capital.
We must stand guard so that no one can approach the Beacon Tower./n
The Beacon Tower is a restricted area./n
How do we light the Beacon Tower? I can't tell you that. It's classified./n
The male soldiers here are very friendly. They sometimes give me delicious food and play with me too, but the grownups in the Nomadic Tribe don't like me coming here./n
It hurts so much! Please, someone stop this pain!/n

It looks like he was bitten by a Black Forest Spider from the southeast. They say those spiders' venom is deadly to people. You'd better off just staying away, but if you have to go please be careful./n
(The Ancestor's Soul is looking north without saying a word.)/n

Long ago people were screaming in the evil darkness where the Four Brightly Shining Stars sleep. This place will see another great disaster if they can't rest in peace in the darkest and deepest part of the highland./n
Those who have injured my descendants, listen carefully. I will make you pay for your crimes. It is too late to regret./n
(The nomad's body has sharp wounds left by a sword.)/n
(The nomad's body was burned all over.)/n
(It looks like the Nomad Grandpa's Corpse was damaged by animals. The corpse has a fistful of something that looks like reptile scales.)/n

So two harsh souls became one./nBehold, the blue soul became the sky and it now surrounds the highland, while the white soul became the light to fill the earth./nTheir ancestors will join hands to build a new home./nUnder the names of Blue Wolf and White Deer.../n(The wandering poet is singing.)/n
I'm really innocent. We nomads are not greedy for other people's property. All we need is enough to get by. What's the point of being greedy? I'm telling you the truth. Please believe me./n
Hey you! Confess to the Viceroy right now! Who else but a filthy nomad like you would steal?/n
See? This is always the problem with the nomads. They sneak in quietly and steal things. Who would want to be friends with rabble like that?/n
When I was young I never thought I would one day become a powerless old man. I thought I'd be traveling the Highland forever, but no one can can't stop time./n
I'm busy! So busy! I'm busy as a bee these days. Majerona used to be a quiet town, but now we have so many travelers coming through./n
We've finished researching Wingers' mating habits and diet, but we still have something very important left to do. Not that I want to deal with it.../n
We hope you'll come see us Matina Merchants!/n
I used to deliver mail to Ishperman by myself, but then the Viceroy assigned me an escort, saying it isn't safe here./n
Welcome to Majerona. This city sits in the center of Duval Highland./n
You should always watch your feet in Duval Highland. People who're used to this place are safe, but one wrong step can make you fall over a cliff./n
Follow this road to the west and you'll see a border checkpoint along the way to the capital city of Ishperman./n
Stay out of trouble in town./n
In South Majerona, there is a Nomadic Tribe led by Lichil./n

Hey you! Have you ever tasted the food at the Majerona Inn? The Chef's signature dish is a specialty of Majeorna. His Goty dishes are so savory that they just melt in your mouth! Just thinking about it makes my mouth water!/n
Was the journey to Duval Highland hard? Most newcomers are amazed by the plateau's height./n
We won't miss even the slightest changes. Anything could lead to a serious problem./n
Whew! I see Majerona is still peaceful./n
Let us know if you see a suspicious person./n
It's very tiring to stand guard while staying focused every moment, but you can't be too careful in something like this./n
Actually, I don't like the nomads coming to Majerona to buy stuff. I don't understand why the Viceroy even lets them to come in./n

Why did I come here alone? Actually, I really, really hate Goty milk! I like sweet juice much better, but my mom forces me to drink it, saying that I won't grow tall if I don't drink some every day. That's why I ran away here where she can't find me./n /nGoty milk is for baby Goties. Why's she making me drink it all the time?/n
This is a local specialty that you can only find in Majerona! You can't buy it anywhere else! Even if you can, you'll end up paying 10 times more! Don't hesitate and buy some now!/n
Duval Highland is a really great place. There are so many materials for making accessories. The smooth white Unirex's molar and goty horns are so beautiful they give me goosebumps!/n
Newer isn't always better. You should learn the true value of antiques; you might be surprised./n
Do you want to help the Majerona Merchant Association?/n

Are you looking for the Viceroy? Tch! Where did that old man go when it's so busy around here? ...Sorry. Ahem. What brings you here? The Viceroy is away on business right now. If you have something to tell the Viceroy, you can tell it to me and I will convey your message./n

Are you looking for the Viceroy? Tut! Where did that old man go? Is he fooling around?/nThe Viceroy is away on business right now. If you have something to tell the Viceroy, you can tell it to me and I will convey your message./n
Have you seen our Viceroy by any chance? He's a benevolent-looking man with somewhat flamboyant clothing./n
We've had a lot more travelers lately. Do you want a drink?/n
Hic! The Prime Minister is more capable than that good-for-nothing King./n
I worry about the fate of this world. What does the King think he's doing?/n
I'm the best cook in town. In particular, my special Goty meat dish is second to none!/n
I'm sorry, but I don't know you. Can you just leave me alone?/n
Oh heavens! Why did my only son have to die so young?/n
Achoo! Achoo! I've feeling sick for the past few days. I promised Thian that we'll go see the Beacon Tower when I get better, but I don't think I'll be able to any time soon... Achoo! /n
When do you think I'll recover? No one's going to like me if I'm ill like this for the rest of my life.../n
Yulieta is feeling weaker every day. I'm really worried. Is she going to make it?/n
The medicinal herbs in the Highland are very effective, and you can make very effective medicine from them./n

I ran a tool store here all my life. I'm too old now though, so taught my grandson the trade and retired. But I couldn't stay home because he's still so young and I'm worried. That's why I come out to the store and keep an eye on him./n

At this price, this product might as well be free. It's hard to find something like this even back home in Darson. Don't you think a great shop like the Majerona Armor Store should sell good stuff like this?/n
To tell you the truth, it's not like I don't want live a comfortable life, but our traditional way of life has been passed down from our ancestors. I can't abandon my own roots./n
Someone has been stealing the crops I worked so hard for all year! I'll make him pay for what he did!/n

The wandering merchants were supposed to come here by yesterday, but they're nowhere to be seen. Could it be that something happened to them? I should look for them, but I have no idea where they could be...
There's been a lot of weird stuff going on. The sound of the wind from the ancient windmill has been odd lately too.../n
I may be a stubborn old man, but my grandson is more stubborn than I am. He left the tribe, whining about how he didn't like it here. It's been years now./n
When I look at the lake, I feel like I'm being drawn to it./n
Hey! What will you pay someone for saving your life? What kind of question is that?/n
Hello! I see you're a newcomer. I hope you have great time in Majerona./n
Hello! I see you're a newcomer. I hope you have great time in Majerona./n
Hello! I see you're a newcomer. I hope you have great time in Majerona./n
Welcome to the place where the wind stays./n
Are you going on a journey? If you need something prepared, please come visit the Wandering Piking Merchants!/n
Excavating a historical site is a very delicate work. So, what brings you here? Are you here to invest in our lab?/n
Oh, this? It's an Ancient Vital Cube. It's different from those ordinary Vital cubes that are all over town.
Hello! You don't have to worry about me. I'm just a traveler passing through./n
I don't know why this place is such a mess nowadays. We have been seeing some suspicious humans around though, and some of the monsters are going berserk too!/n
I have lots of great weapons!/n
Those rude humans from other places... Our ancestors won't tolerate anyone who desecrate this ancient land!/n
The books of the Ancient Kingdom contain knowledge more advanced than what we have today, but most of them have been lost./n
A weapon that someone dropped. It looks very expensive./n
This is a letter that's been a bit torn up, making it hard to read./n
The nomads' traditional tea cleanses your body and mind. I'm sure you'll become a fan if you take a sip./n
A jar used to make the Nomads' Traditional Tea. It looks very old./n
People from other regions typically visit Duval Highland through Port Balduke. However, I'm worried that there are spies from other countries among them./n
Take a ship from here if you want to go to Blue Coral. If you want to go to Majerona, you should follow the road to the north instead./n
I came from Blue Coral in search of a new job. Just the sight of the coral makes me feel dizzy. I'll become rich here and everyone will envy me./n

The wind in Duval Highland is too strong for a fragile woman like me to endure, but then I saw the nomads walking around the Highland as though it didn't bother them at all. I couldn't even stand straight in wind like that...

Some people from far away places get hurt easily here because they can't adapt to this environment. It's because of the strong gusts of wind and the cliffs that are all over the Highland. If this is your first time in Duval Highland you should watch where you're going.

A little while ago I saw a pretty looking girl while passing by Lan's Lake. She was saying something strange with sad eyes. She said something like The Four Stars... the Darkness is coming... I think I missed the middle part./n
The weapons here are precious assets of the Valkaras Kingdom. Don't touch anything without authorization!/n
Take a look at these weapons! No one can invade Duval Highland through Port Balduke as long as we have these powerful weapons./n
It's true that we have a great defensive system at the port because of these wepons. However, I want you to remember that I have to come and mend them every day./n
You don't look like you're from around here... Did you come from a faraway place?/n
There is a Border Guard Soldier at the East Charon Port. Nevertheless, we shouldn't let our guard down just because we have the border patrol./n
Follow this road to the west and you'll come to a Border Checkpoint. Go further east from there and you'll arrive at Majerona./n

You'll see a lot of merchants giving all they've got in international trading while staying at Port Charon. I swear they'd even go into a dragon's nest if they could sell their products at a high enough price./n

I came here following rumors of a giant dragon in the Ancient Mountain. I've been here for more than a year but... Some day I'll defeat the dragon with my own sword. Right now I'm waiting for my chance to attack the dragon! Any great warrior should know when to fight./n

I followed my older brother to Majerona a little while back. I was very surprised to see so many mysterious animals on the roads./n /nSome of them were so cute that I wanted to bring them here as pets! But my brother wouldn't allow it.../n
I store traders' items in the safest place ever. I kill everything that tries to get in, even flies!/n/n/n/n/n(Use Shift key to share an item.)
You can get to Louran Desert from here. You don't have to ride the ship; the Vital Cube can get you there./n
(They look like the traces of Azel.)/n
Nomads don't lie. And we're always true to our word./n
Do you want to go to Blue Coral? I'll send you there as quickly as I can./n
Where did all my horses go?
My mom told me not to play outside because it's dangerous. I'm a really good runner too...
I think it's very dangerous to raise a child in the highland. I've even heard that the scary dragon that the heroes had to fight off has came back...
Yawn! There's nothing to do here!
I want to go back to Ishperman as soon as possible.
You trolls! How dare you interfere with my research!
This town has a great view!
This is an old Vital Cube./nI wonder if it still works.
I'm Hamudan, the leader of this nomadic tribe. I don't know why you came, but I want you to stay out trouble while you're here./n
Hello! I see you're a newcomer. I hope you have great time in Majerona./n
Come see me if you think there's something wrong with your weapons or armor! I'll repair them and they'll be as good as new!

Hi there! You came just in time! /nThe nomadic tribe's blacksmith made some of the most durable and powerful weapons he's ever made! /nThis is a sign that you should buy them! You should at least take a look at them, don't you think?/n
I have some of the most powerful weapons in the world, and also incredible armor that even the most powerful monsters can't penetrate!/nTake your time and find the gear that's right for you!/n
Welcome! What kind of weapon do you want to buy? I don't have that much variety compared with those merchants in the city, but I do have some very durable and powerful items./n

Life among nomads is much harder than people expect. Around here, survival means paying careful attention to safety, facing constant danger and keeping our armor store fully stocked!/nThe armor we make is designed to turn the harshest blows.
The fastest way to become the best warrior in the Orta Continent is to use your sword and shield as effectively as you can. I know that very skill./nDo you want to learn?
Ugh! This Matina Merchant is really persistent. Who would buy something so expensive? Anyway, what kind of armor do you need?/n

The most important thing in hunting is the hunter's skill, but even the most skilled hunter won't be so effective if his bow is broken. That's why you should repair your weapons whenever you have the chance./n
That your friends can use their swords on enemies without having to look over their shoulders is because they know we Clerics have their back./nWill you learn Healing Skills?

Magic may seem complicated and difficult, but it's actually a rather enjoyable process of reading the flow of the Mana in the air that's invisible to others./nDo you want me to teach you how to read the Mana Stream?
If you don't use the Vital Cubes in a world like this, they'll call you old-fashioned./n
The Greenleaf Healers are all over the Orta Continent to serve others./n
Come see us if you get hurt or see an injured person. We'll help as much as we can!/n
It's very thrilling to sneak up behind your enemy in total darkness./nDo you want to learn that skill from me?
Are you going to stay at our inn? I promise I'll make your stay comfortable and cozy./n
Hello! We're the Greenleaf in the nomadic tribe of Duval Highland! We Greenleaf Healers try to help travelers no matter where they are, so don't forget to call us if you have an emergency!/n
We the Greenleaf Healers are everywhere in the Orta Continent. Don't hesitate to ask for our help when you're in danger!/n
Hello! We're the Greenleaf in the Nomadic Tribe of Duval Highland! If you're sick or hurt, please don't hesitate and come see us!/n
We the Greenleaf Healers are always with you adventurers, wherever you are./n
No matter how powerful you weapon is, it will become dull if you use it often, but I can make it good as new if you let me repair it./n

Are you going to stay at our inn? I promise I'll make your stay comfortable and cozy./n
I have all the ingredients for making the most delectably delicious dishes!/n
I have all the ingredients for making the most delectably delicious dishes!/n
I have all the ingredients for making the most delectably delicious dishes!/n
We Pikins don't rip you off or lie about the quality of our products!/n
A friend of mine working in Darson told me that I can sell goods at higher prices in Majerona, so I'd invested all my money in merchandise to sell. Everything in the warehouse is mine!/n
It would be a good idea to carry a quality weapon with you because the animals have become really violent lately. I have many quality weapons, so have a look!/n

The products at our store are... So... What did my grandma say? Oh! That's right! You can use them for 10 years, and they'll still be as good as new. And they're very cheap! Do you want to take a look around?/n
Please help me! I'm selling all the things that got damaged when we were raided at very low prices. I need to make some money so I can buy myself a meal./n
There're so many people at Blue Coral, all the time. It's so full of great energy!

The wind is blowing. The Great Spirit must have brushed over your shoulders./n
I had no idea this highland could be turned into such a desolate place.
The Divine Lake of Promise is covered with a stench of blood./nOur ancestors would be heartbroken if they knew about this.
The Divine Lake of Promise is covered with a stench of blood./nOur ancestors would be heartbroken if they knew about this.
You must not make the Wind God angry.
Haha! It looks like people are afraid of how I look. I guess I have to cut my fingernails./nI'm actually a nice Keiger.
There is a wound as if he was attacked by a spider.
This fresh air.../nThis climate reminds me of my hometown on Shimmering Island! This has got to be where the Lime is. Heheheh!
This fresh air.../nThis climate reminds me of my hometown on Shimmering Island! This has got to be where the Lime is. Heheheh!
There is a wound as if he was attacked by a spider.
You can feel the sacred energy.
Those filthy demons who won't even let the dead rest in peace!/nYou'll pay for what you did someday. I'll make sure of it.
I miss my family and friends!/nPlease let me go!
I miss my family and friends!/nPlease let me go!
Sigh.../n(This Brunhilt looks kind of sad.)
This is a spell scroll with some mysterious energy.
This is a spell scroll with some mysterious energy.
This is a spell scroll with some mysterious energy.
It's hard to even get the metal because of the rugged terrain! Well, I can't help that.
You can't make a good bow with this timber.../nIs there any way I can get some good materials?
There are so many things to study about mysterious phenomena here!
Welcome to the Animal Farmyard! Woof!
Welcome to the Animal Farmyard! Woof!
My lifelong dream is to kill the Choux Cream Group made up of evil Shukas!/nBut now, I'm too old to do anything...
How can this be? How can this be?
There are traces of some heavy items.
How can this be? How can this be?
Ugh!/nWhy am I so tired nowadays?
I came all the way here pursuing someone.
I'll be good from now on!/nHehe!
Dang! I can't believe I have to clean up after those evil merchants just because I ran out of money!
It's all because of Naul./nStupid Naul!
What should I do now?/nI'm lost...
My gut feeling turned out right, and it's worrying me.
Oh, this must be a curse! A curse!
I've been exploring the uncharted regions to create a new dish.
Wow! I've never laid my eyes on this kind of new world!
Wow! I've never laid my eyes on this kind of new world!

We Pikins are suffering from the cruel and merciless Matinas even at this moment./nPlease help us...
I'm worried about Levine. He's always worried about his race, and yet he doesn't take care of himself.
So many of my friends were hurt and killed.
Welcome to Dust Coral Town!/nI don't have any food to offer, but I hope you can get some rest before you go.
Are you also a Lime Adventurer?/nHmph. Young people nowadays are... Ugh! Learn from my grandson Kyle! Ahem!

I want to go search for the Lime too! When I grow up to be as tall as Kyle, I'll go search for the Lime./nHuh? Did you just ask me if it's real? Well, it's just a rumor.../nBut if it is real, I should be able to meet my mom and dad again. I've heard that the Lime grants you any wish you have!
Have you seen Kyle? Where did he go?
How can there be Sobeks in a desolate desert like this? This is truly a mystery./nCan you believe it?
Hello! My name is Tint! I'm from Dust Coral./nI'm more interested in something like this than collecting coral.
You're such a hick! What, is this your first time seeing a Matina? What are you staring at?
They say there is a free country occupied by Pikins called Constania far away from here...
If someone runs away from this desert, he will suffer and he'll make those he leaves behind suffer as well.
I may be a slave, but not a thief!
Don't think for a moment that Hasredin could be the owner of this farm.
Oh! You startled me! Never talk to a Pikin's back! I almost had a heart attack!
It's so sad being a slave!
It's not going to rain again, is it?
If we don't buy water today, the townspeople will...
Look at the blue water. All of it belongs to me, Himus!
I own all the water around here. Don't put your dirty feet in there.
I hope Guard Captain Tamburini comes back soon...
I'm thirsty. The sun's too hot.
My older brother Ginia lost my mom's most favorite ring!/nWill my brother survive this?
I'm looking for an item to decorate the Ikle.
If I find the Lime, the first thing I want to do is increase the number of Pikins and have one million Pikin slaves!
Mull! Atse! Isn't there anything fun to do?/nArgh! I'm bored to death!/n
Let's go see the pet that Udir brought!/nIt has a mouth big enough to swallow little ones like Mull. Hahaha!
I'll go get some rest./nMeanwhile, go load the items for the cottage./n
Sand got into my shoes! Ugh!
My name is Gyun, and he's my partner Chanu./nWe deliver news about everyday life all over the continent./n
The golden sand and green oasis seen from here are so beautiful!
Go away!/nI'm in the middle of an important conversation!/n(He must be really angry about something.)
.../n(He glances at you but doesn't say anything. It's as if he doesn't want to be bothered.)
How did you like seeing the ancient organism that we're raising?/nI caught the baby when its mother was away after hiding in the woods in the Ancient Mountain!/n
.../n(It's still young, but its big, sharp fangs looks very menacing.)
.../n(It's still young, but its big, sharp fangs looks very menacing.)
My dog is scared of the monster that man brought with him, but I'm not afraid of something like that.
Whew! The landlady loves cats so much that the entire second floor of this inn is totally occupied by cats./nI get that she loves cats and all, but how is she going to do business here?/n
.../n(It looks like the three black cats are the leaders.)
Whenever I look the water, I miss Blue Coral and Beren.
Hush!/nAmong the landlady's cats, there are three cats you must pay special attention to./nThey're very violent, so be careful around them.

This is a desert city called Al Amir in the Republic of Al Hapan./nI came here because I heard that Al Amir's Merchants are hiring human workers, but I still haven't found a job./nAre you here for a job too?
Yes sir!/nGo rest all you want and come back, boss!

My brother and I are going to open our store by saving all the money we could make from working for the Matina Merchants./nWe still need much more, but when we open, please come to the Rose Store any time you can!/n
Hmm.../n(It looks like he's thinking about something. But which one is the older brother?)/n

I came to Louran Desert all the way from the West Tumbara Plains so I can explore the historical sites, but I forgot all about the historical sites while taking a look at the vast array of items in Al Amir's!/nYou should be careful too./nI swear there is a god that makes you buy items on impulse!/n/nOh, by the way, how did you like the ribbon I tied on my husband Noah?/nIsn't he cute? Ahahaha!
.../n(An embarrassed male Turga is wearing a Red Ribbon on his head more suited to a little girl.)/n
Isn't there a cool name for us to go by?/nCuls. Kilt. Cultwo. /nHmm... Which one should we use?
Are you here to repair your equipment?/nWhew!/nThat Rune Jewel Upgrade option is making me use up all my tools./n
I need to get some money for lodgings./nWhere did I put my wallet?
I don't have any time to waste!/nWhen is he coming back?/n(He must be waiting for someone.)
The humans may be persuasive,/nbut I'm certainly not going to trust them with my money when I worked so hard for it!/nBurying it in the desert would be safer!
Any valuables stored here will be totally secure. We could have ten more Plains Wars and they'd still be safe.
No one can get through if Stormwalkers protect the area. We Stormwalkers will protect your treasures./n
Welcome! I'll risk my own life to protect your valuables!/n
I'm waiting/nfor the master to come out of the warehouse./n

The Pikin Slaves/naren't working hard enough nowadays./nI'm sure all this nonsense about the Lime - whatever that is! -/nhas affected my slaves as well./nI'd better come up with a plan to deal with it.

We Ichichikas came from the Forest of Giants in South Ortara./nI really miss the thick forest, but, for the survival of our clan, I can't go back. I have to work as a mercenary.
This is Tirole, home of the Ichichika Clan.
When will Tamburini free me from this exile?/nI wish I could see the Blue Lake in Al Amir again.
I feel sorry for the Pikin Slave./nI told my father to stop chasing after the slave, but he doesn't listen to me.
The Matinas are arrogant./nI understand that they're employing him and all, but sometimes you just can't take it anymore!/nArgh! I wish I could beat them up!
I should never have left home.../nI even miss the Sanus. They're our natural enemies, and I miss them! That's how you know you've been gone too long.
The Pikins! I feel sorry for the Pikins! Argh!/nI hate you, Dalchik! Grrr!
Isn't the town kind of empty?/nAll the men took off chasing a runaway slave.
The old man/n is a tight-fisted miser./n

Welcome, welcome! Bring me your specialty items, your valuable finds! I'll trade you the tools you need!
When/ndo you think I can return to my hometown?/n
Aww... .../n(Looking very tired and ill.) Has he been starving?)
Owww...Argh! Oh, my stomach!/nWho are you? Be gone!
I need a more powerful Matina!/nThose worthless Pikin Slaves couldn't even catch that stupid monster, and they're costing me money!
The Lime must be worth an awful lot of money.
Oh! I came to see Al-Hadin, but why are they so many filthy adventurers here?/nAl-Hadin wouldn't meet me either. Oh, this is really frustrating!
It's way too hot today. I can't even remember the last time it rained /nThis has to be harder on the desert clans who buy their water from the Matinas.
Hahaha! The Al-Hadin's Guards bragging about their master's wealth./nBut now, thanks to the monster at the Salt Cave, he's out of business!/nI'm sure this is the Curse of the Lime'!
I saw the monster at the Salt Mine with my own eyes.../nWhew! I'm so scared. You can forget about it. No one can catch it.
I'm a slave of the Al-Hadins./nFour generations of my family have been slaves of the Al-Hadins.
Ahahahaha! I really like this cottage!/nBut Uncle Al-Hadin says he hates being in this country. People come to our house everyday, and he can't stand it! It's fun.
Hehe! The Pikins are fools. They're filthy. And always say they're hungry./nI mean, if you don't have any bread, you can always eat some meat! The Pikins are so stupid.
Whew! My back is killing me!
What's Lime? Is it food?/nI just need some food.
Hehehe! I'm not sure if Al-Hadin really has the Lime,/nbut thanks to that rumor, more customers are coming to me.
They say the monster that shows up at Al-Hadin's Salt Mine uses powerful magic./nBut I'll cut it in half with my sword.
I'll go wherever my magical skills are needed./nJust call me and I'll be there!
Ha!/nWe'll have a crescent moon tonight. It's a perfect day to run away!
Welcome to Twin Clovers Guild Coraleve Mine Branch!
Welcome to Twin Clovers Guild Green Coral Branch!
Wow! Hello!/nThis is the Twin Clovers Guild Blue Coral Branch, run by the most beautiful woman in Orta!
The three most scary things in the world must be Lilina, Lilina, and Lilina./n.../nJust the thought of it makes me shiver!
Welcome. This is the Twin Clovers Guild Red Coral Branch.
I hope there will be peace on the Silent Light Hill./nIt's because I enjoy taking a nap there.
Welcome to the Twin Clovers Historical Site Excavation Branch!
My name is Helsing./nI'm on an adventure to save the poor lost souls wandering around in the Orta Continent!
The ocean is more beautiful than anything else in the whole world, but when it gets angry, there's no stopping it.
Welcome to the Twin Clovers Guild North Rescue Branch!
Oh, it's not like I can return to the Coral Mine... I need to collect some corals, what should I do?/n

Finding Lime will make me rich! Rich!
Why are relics always stashed away in some hidden place? I really wish it was in the middle of downtown or my front yard!/nWhy did you have to make me come all the way here? I really hate this!
Why are relics always stashed away in some hidden place? I really wish it was in the middle of downtown or my front yard!/nWhy did you have to make me come all the way here? I really hate this!
He's such a miserly Matina!/nHe values money more than a person's life.
Is money that important? Or is a person's life more important?
You human beggars! You should always pay when you use someone else's things!/nCough up the money!
Birds of a feather flock together. /nA beggar's friend is a beggar, and a thief's friend is a thief.
Why do we live in this desert? Money, hahahaha! Why else?
Pleas save me!/nI miss my husband, Besollo!
I can't live without my beloved Besollo.
Why is my older brother so coldhearted?
Don't involve yourself in something that doesn't concern you.
Those ungrateful Ichichikas!/nHow dare they disobey a Matina when we're the ones who feed them! I'm so disappointed.
I want to go back to Al Amirro.
Thank you for helping me./nI will never be a slave again!
Matinas can't enter Tirole for the sake of protecting the privacy of Ichichikas!
I have the best hand skills in this town!
Someone dropped this worn out bundle...
Where did my older brother go?
It's too dry today./nIt's been a long while since I saw rain.
Is this a desert?/nI haven't seen a single drop of water in three days!
An eye for an eye. Money for money.
Oh, people really don't keep their promises.
Haha! I guess I have to cut my fingernails. It looks like people are afraid of me because of how I look./nI'm actually a nice Keiger.
This sandstorm is ruining my clothes.
All the Crokies should have died then. Why did they have to stay alive to bother us?
Although the Crokies are doing bad things now, they were once good brothers to us.
Brother! A human saved me when my life was in danger.
Those Matinas! They destroyed our town, but I'll be keeping an eye on them. When I die I'll become a ghost and haunt them!
It's a Large Stone that doesn't look like it's going to move at all.
I'm a mercenary and my job is to escort them. Although I'm badly injured now...
Oh! Lominet! Even the heavens won't help us love each other!
Julio! I would even go to Hell if that's what it takes to be with you!
Hello! Welcome to the Twin Clovers Guild Mushrock Forest Branch!
Welcome! We're the Twin Clovers Adventurer Guild!

Don't think for a moment that happiness is what you'll find at the end of an adventure! I've seen so many adventurers around and I myself was an adventurer, but the end of an adventure was never sweet...All you will have left is a fond memory.
My name is Iccina, and I'm one of Mamundo's Guards. I think you should always trust and have faith on each other.
Mamundo...He lent me money when I didn't really ask for it, and he wants many times more back...What should I do?
Have you ever seen a Desert Katumbo's tail? I didn't even know they had tails. But apparently they're priceless.
This is the Twin Clovers Dust Coral Branch! As you can see, the town is in a mess!
Louran is an inhospitable environment filled with dangerous animals. And it's the only place I feel truly aliveas a hunter.
Well, you don't have to hate this place just because it's dangerous here! You'll get used to it.
I feel sorry for the Pikins, but I have to keep my end of the bargain with the Matinas. I have to keep my word. It's what we believe in.
Oh boy! I should catch more Pikins so I can make more money!
I don't feel good right now...I need to get some rest.
You get me the ingredients, I turn them into a medicine. What do you need?
Look at this view! What do you think? It won't be too odd at all to list it as one of the wonders of the continent!
I'm in the middle of an experiment and I need to focus. Could you keep quiet for a moment?
An experiment in a desert? But I'll die of thirst!
What is all this? Kukos! It's great!
Sometimes I think I'm not cut out for the life of a merchant. It feels like my head is going to blow when I curry favor with others.
What do they eat in this place? I'm starving!
Those evil Kobolds! How dare they challenge me!
I'll show you a new side of Schiers./nWe're the [Jumping Schier Transformation Research Team]!
While others have physical power, we have a higher intelligence. You shouldn't underestimate us!
After this experiment, other races will stop underestimating our physical abilities.
Hello! Twin Clovers.../nWhew! I can't do this./n(Hanging her head and shedding tears.)
Hi! Welcome to the Twin Clovers Guild Central Oasis Branch!
How long will we have to make a living out of hurting others?
I may look like I'm merely standing here doing nothing, but I'm actually very busy.
Those worthless Pikins! They should at least be able to do the job of one person!
Baa! I really don't think I should be doing this...I wish the master is a little more considerate of us.
One of these days, I'll escape slavery. And I'll make sure he Matinas know it!
It's a very dangerous thing. I really wish the master would stop being so stubborn!
Hello! Welcome to the Twin Clovers Guild Dugobi Dune Branch!
These muscles! This size! They're enough to show everyone that I'm a brave warrior!
It's no fun living in the Louran Desert. You've got the environment, which is harsh, and then you've got those calculating Matinas.
My name is Meiho! I'm a brave Truga Warrior.
The desert sky never seemed so clear to me before now! Hahaha!
The Matinas lost their temper because of the runaway Pikins! This is precisely when we should stay focused.
Hello! Welcome to the Twin Clovers Guild Hidden Watch Tower Branch!
Hello! Welcome to the Twin Clovers Historical Port Branch!
Dang! I got separated from my friends because of the sandstorm! I need to find them!
Hey! Have you seen any Pikins wandering around here? They're all runaways!
They're really strange. Definitely worth an in-depth study.
I was never sure about this research, but I'll do my best.
It takes valor and courage ito be a hunter. I want you to know that, too.
Zihomis, I don't think you should rush it.
(Gasp). Let's hold on a little longer!
The situation is really bad. At this rate, I doubt if we can make out of here alive.
Wake up everyone! We get the Lime, and we'll get everything we ever wanted!
How is the captain going to solve this problem? This is really...crazy!
I've learned the hard way that when the captain is unstable, his men will suffer.
Hehe! Is something worrying you? But telling me about it won't help much.
Oh, boy! What should I do?
I'm so thirsty, I'll collapse if I keep on moving like this.
We're used to this type of environment because we've lived in the Louran Desert for a long time. You'll get used to this place pretty soon, Adventurer.
We should not be arrogant but be true to our life...Try to be humble.
Come here./n(Whispering) /n...Beware of Jenita, our master.
(Shivering)...This doesn't make sense at all! I'm sure I'm going to die at this rate.
Hello! I'm Jiusun, a member of the Twin Clovers Guild.
If I can get through this, it will make me a better warrior, right?
Al Savanna is next. You'd better be fully prepared if you're going to go there.
Okay, Niabe! Go do your job! You had enough rest!
I'm tired! I'm so tired that I can't even speak.
Whew! Nothing is working out nowadays...Does this mean that I'm unlucky?
Why did I get stuck having to carry out the mission in a situation like this? This is awful!
Actually, no place is worse than here. How long do we have to keep on living like this?
Al Savanna desperately needs more volunteers. We're looking for adventurers who will help us in this.
What do you want newbie? How dare you try to talk to me!
Good intentions... Are within everyone's heart.../n...My heart is warm...
How can they be so ungrateful after all the Khan's done for them?
Whew! The clouds in the sky are just drifting away. Where is Chief Saika's heart?
Where am I? Who am I?
Hi! It's good to see you! My name is Malliga!
Hi! It's good to see you! My name is Malliga!
This Pikin Corpse looks like it was seriously wounded by Sawlimbs before he died.
This is a very well dried sheaf of straw.
This is the bag that Miraka hid.
I'm not going to miss a dry desert like this./nI'll change this place with the power of Lime.
I'm sure this Coral Forest has some secrets that can't be solved by science.

I believe that merciful Goddess Nysis is still staying somewhere in this Coral Forest. We, the Greenleaf Healers, have invited a famous Schier biologist named Starping to so we can find answers to why the corals are dying. And get some blessings.

If I bring some of the Sobeks from this forest and turn them into my slaves, I'll be able to increase my farm harvest in the desert by three or even 10 times. Tut!/nWhy did my parents gave birth to me in the middle of a desert?
Every time I come here, I can see so many changes in the Blue Coral Forest. I was a little kid when I was here last time, and now I'm a gray-haired old man. Hahahaha!
Some of the words written there are damaged and illegible.
This is a jar engraved with patterns you have never seen.
I was ordered to protect the legendary fighter here.
The blue light reflected in the eyes of the [Great Spirit] will guide us.
Strange things started happening around me ever since that blue light was spotted.
Some of the words written there are damaged and illegible.
What should we do? Those evil Shukas!/nI will never forget what they have done to me.
(This is a jar with a strange fragrance...)
I know extraordinary things not explainable by common sense. /nDo you want to know what they are? Give up this world, and you'll find out.
(You can't tell how he got here, but he looks very hungry.)
What was that? I must be seeing things! Oh! This is a nightmare!
Am I still alive? Am I?
What are you all doing here? We just arrived at Louran!
Why is it so hot here?
Oh, I can't go anymore. This is not what I expected.
