I see you're a traveler. Do you want to take a break here? /n /nIf you can't craft items anymore because you did it too much, you can recover by resting at an inn. Of course, you'll need to pay for it. Money doesn't grow on trees after all./n
It's dangerous out, so please come inside.
How can you be dozing off like that?
Oh, I wasn't./nI was just closing my eyes because they stung!
Oh! He's an idiot!/nWhy did he have to get caught by none other than the Guard Captain?
Mine is the best inn in Al Savanna./nAnd I have been called the most Beautiful Woman in Orta! Come to Utsna Inn where^#FFFF00Utsna^#FFFFFFis!/n
A beautiful woman?/nI needed to take a break anyway. I should stop by at the inn then!/nHehehe.../nHey! I'm not going to the inn for the beautiful woman!
[Announcement] /nMore drinking water in Turhaman is being used up because of the rapid increase in the number of visitors./nEveryone!^#FFFF00Please save water.^#FFFFFF/n [Al Turman]
I sell cheap items at high prices!/nHey, you! What was the cheapest price you were offered? I can beat it!
I said I WAS a beautiful woman. I didn't say I'm still beautiful!/nIt's your fault you got fooled! That's right!
Oh, what would the most beautiful woman in Orta look like?/nI can't wait to make her mine with my beautiful songs!
Argh! What is this? I thought there would be a beautiful woman! What's an old lady doing here?
Is there something you want me to do?/nThen bring me some money.
Awww.../nI came here because I thought I'd find a beautiful woman, but I was tricked!/nThis isn't fair!
Whew! There are so many Tailor Shops on the second floor, and that's why I'm very busy right now!
What do you know about love?
Hey!/nCan't you read the sign? It says no dogs are allowed!
Why can't I bring a dog in there?/nThis dog is my lovely pet dog!
We Pikins are hard workers, and that's why Turman let us work here.
I need to save as much money as I can and go back to my hometown./nMy family is waiting for me!
I would hire Pikins again if I have to hire some more employees./nThey're very honest and hard working fellas!
Tut! Why would you want to pay those Pikins to work for you?/nI don't like the way things are working here!
Actually, there aren't many books!/nThat's why I don't have much to do right now.
My name is Jacks! I'm the leader of the Black Group Members!/Soon we'll rise from the ghetto and conquer the world! Ahahaha!
What, do you have a problem with me? Then take your shot!
Hey! You trainee!/nIs that the best you can do?
I can't believe I got caught fooling around by Kuang!
Don't worry! I'll make it painless when I hit you!
He's being punished for fooling around.
Owww.../nI sprained my ankle and I can't move.
Don't you think the bread I baked looks delicious?
Oh, I told you -- you don't have to buy authentic ones at high prices!
Are you sure this is good?
You should have enough food saved up before you can start excavating.
My things were stolen!/nIt must be him! He practically has the word [Criminal] tattooed on his face!
I didn't do anything!/nHave you ever seen such a criminal who looked this innocent?
The Wingers must be tired from running all the way here. Maybe I should take a break before I leave this place.
Oh, I'm telling you, this is a great bargain price!
They say clerics are very popular nowadays because they provide great protection for their friends...
I'll learn as much as I can and open a big smithy some day!
I'll try very hard to learn the trade so I can make pretty swords!
Hey! Why is it so expensive here?/nStop trying to rip me off!
Be careful from now on! This is a very dangerous place!
A moment ago, I heard someone scream.../nDid something happen?
We were dispatched to this place to manage one of the farms around here.
Udil is so stupid that he gets ripped off all the time.../nDang! I should just mind my own business!
Hey, I'm telling you that if you plant a bean, you can climb the bean sprout to the sky!
Monsters are showing up near the farm. This is a serious problem!
I'm bored! Bored!/nThe immigration office must be more exciting than this.
I can't stand guard at the farm because I'm a new recruit.
You look very much like me!
I don't know either!/nArgh! I really hate the Kobolds!
Why aren't there any guards here?/nWhy are the Kobolds here?
No! I'm sorry!/nI'll give you a gift because I messed up!
Mom? Are you my mom?/nActually, I'm your mom! Heh!
Welcomem customer!/nTo the free city of Constania!
(The Pikin Slave has a blank expression.)
Is this meal time already? Do you want some food?
I need to bury the manure on the farm!/nKehehehe! Just the thought of it makes me laugh! Kakakaka!
Hah!/nHuh? Who are you? /nArgh! Don't come near me! Save me!
(The cloth is still warm from the body heat.)
(This corpse has wounds left by monsters.)
(This corpse has wounds left by monsters.)
I can't believe I missed three of them!
Hey Garen! Let's at least protect the ones left behind!
I can't let them hurt my child!
Hehehe! I want to live!/nI want to live!
It's written:/n[A noble spirit rests here.]
Welcome to the Mosla Merchant Association!/nMy name is Honey, and I'm the leader of the Mosla Merchant Association!
Since you're here, you might as well take a look around because I have lots of great items!
Not many people are willing to take the risk of running a business! It's quite profitable!
Stop thinking about it and just buy it!/nThis item could save your life someday!
The merchants wander around in the desert, so they must have brave mercenaries like us!
It's been a while since we've settled down in one place to sell items./nHowever, we can't let our guard down against the monsters!
Should I buy a portable recovery potion?
Can you see Al Sarvana?/nIt's a really picturesque sight!
The Turian Army will never be defeated!
I'm not afraid of dying for my men.
I won't even mind going to Hell as long as the captain is with me!
I can't let Carya's men or Balaur kill me!
But still, it's an honor to serve with the captain.
Business is good here, but it's too dangerous.
We can't let our guard down.
They say the Matinas are living in Mosla Spira. Is this true?
Well?/nBut then again, isn't it true there is no way we can go all the way down the pit?
Oh.../nWho would build a windmill in a place like this?
Hey, Postania!/nStop looking at that stupid machine and let's go to the excavation site!
One thing led to another, and I ended up here./nI should go to Port Darvan as soon as possible, but I'm worried because it's so far away.
Being a tailor is very hard.../nWould someone help me?
We can combine our power when we're in real danger.
I'm not dancing. I'm riding the rhythm for 60 minutes./nImpossibility is nothing.
Smack.../nI'm always hungry because I'm always the one who gets pinned down at the bottom!
Some people call me.../nthe Dark Knight.
Aww!/nThe sight of him always makes me feel excited! It feels like I need to shout at least 22 times!
Aha! I see your fate is becoming stronger./nI mean your faith.
I'll find a way to reverse time one of these days.
It's an old pillar that would collapse with just a little nudge.

Keke.. How may I help you?
I have a bargain for you.
Won't you trade with me?/nI have something you might like.
Give me any good items you have.
I need to look after my wounded friends.
My children are waiting for me at home. They're about the same age as Lefri.
Our master gave us too much work. We don't know what to do!
Don't you think Mongsiri is so cute?
You can say I'm living a more comfortable life than my friends.../nBut my master even changed my name as you can see.
I've been working so hard cutting down the trees that I even developed mouth odor!
I will never be a Matina who just sits there while the world crumbles down around you. Not like my father!
He wants me to bring the materials for trade if I want to buy the armor!/nFor crying out loud! I'm speechless!
We became mercenaries to make money.
Lynn always sends me to a dangerous place.../nYou may say we're like Gordioida and Stenopelmatidae.
I'm supposed to make a jewel box for Carmen but I can't get the materials./nWhat should I do?
I want to eat something sour nowadays.
Money comes before friends!/nWhy? Because I need money for my research project!
There's a ghost on the opposite side!
Cough. I'm feeling worse and worse these days.
I didn't know being a merchant could be this hard...
I need to tell my master./nI promised my master that I would create a merchant association.
It's any man's dream to hold the rudder of a proud sailing ship!
You took me here on a date, and here you're talking about ships./nShould we just break up now?
(I'll make him pay for this someday.)
I got tangled up in a problem. Please someone help me!
How dare you stare at me like that, you lowly Pikin!
A ghost with chopsticks keeps hitting me! Please help me!
Try not to get ripped off. There's someone pretending to be me./nDon't pay 5 million Feathers to him.
(This is a Town Bulletin Board, but it doesn't look like it's used often. Nothing is posted on there yet.)
Timo is giving me a headache.
Argh! What are those bluish ones?
I'll become the best fisherman in Orta!
How may I be of service to you?
I have a great bargain for you.
Won't you trade with me?/nI have something you might love.
Give me any great items you have.
I'm the Legendary Adventurer, Minuk Detudito!/nEveryone, welcome to the den of devils!
Did Minuk say something about his being a legend again?/nWe're not on an adventure! We're on a raid!
Big Tom? I'll slug you if you follow me around!/nDon't worry, Big Tom is stupid. He'll never catch me!
We need to get out of here before Big Tom chases us down!
Oh boy!/nThe whale is whining, saying he's hungry!
Look at the hill on the opposite side of me!/nDon't you think Big Tom has a huge butt?/nI'm sure he farts a lot too since he has huge butt!
Big Tom and I made eye contact. He'll be here any moment now!/nLet's get out of here right now!
Big Tom is after us!/nBut what will happen when the aircraft takes off?
This is a great day, and the moon is smiling at you!/nHave a nice day!
Oh, I'm so bored.../nCan't I be on a fun and exciting adventure?
My corals! The Timo licked them clean!
My older sister is looking for me, but I still have too much to do here./nThere are so many mysteries in this world that we don't know about.
What's happening here? Oh boy! It's giving me a headache!
I came to excavate this historical site upon the request of the Chief of the Blue Coral.
Don't tell me the Tu Inti Warriors will come to this place too!
Where did my older brother go?
If I don't try harder... I won't overcome this difficulty.
Please help us! The later we are the worse it will be!
I should have trained harder when I had the chance.
I wish we had more power.
The three of them are watching me!
More people are getting injured while passing through this forest.
It's harder to guard this place because we just don't have enough manpower.
There are so many seemingly useless things around here that are actually very useful, if you look closely.
I must go get a coral sample...
I already miss the fresh air of Duval Highland.
I have really great items here but I can't talk about them. Oh, this is so frustrating!
There's a Balaur is hiding around here. Be careful.
I really wish I could sleep all night.
Something tells me we'll have some good news soon.
Master... Please don't leave me behind.
Don't stop me. I need to go see him.
I'm scared. Go away!/nI'll keep hiding here.
Helsing is really something else. How could he volunteer to work in a dangerous place like this?
Descendant of Seiprant! It's time to keep your oath of friendship.
The Marinebees took my house and land. I can never forget that, even after I die.
My friends are badly hurt. They need to be treated right now.
A true friend is the one who helps you when you're in trouble.
Queen Rudivari... My dear older sister...
You should have come here earlier! You're already too late...
You must focus more while standing guard.
I'll be rich when I find the Lime. Rich!
Why are relics always stashed away somewhere awfulr? I really wish it was in the middle of downtown or my front yard!/nWhy did you have to make me come all the way here? I really hate this!
A box that looks perfect for storing samples.
So...hmm.../nWhy is a Topiary wandering around here?
I can't let something like Tu Matas kill me!
I will slay every one of them!
I can't believe I was being so careless...
Cordelia rocks!/nYou have no clue what I'm feeling!
Why can't we catch the Phantom Thief?
Does she know how I feel towards her?/nShe must know!/nBut...
I want to see my daughter as soon as possible!/nNothing in this world could replace my lovely daughter...
I'll be the world's be chef one day!
Actually, I started this job just because I want to be with Spa.
Awww...There is a problem! Should I say it like this or.../nTrouble? Please tell me which is better.
Argh!/nWhat is this? It's not a monster! Why did you startle me?
I lost my book...What should I do?
It's been quite a while since I last ran an experiment in this place.
Why did this have to happen at such a crucial moment?
Barefoot! I'll make him pay for this!
This corpse has wounds left by monsters.
Monsters! I won't let you hurt my daughter!
Good! I'll wipe out the Rayos members!
The regular guards were sent to stand guard against the Tutos./nThat's why I'm guarding this place instead.
Hmm...If I combine the climate and conditions here.../nHuh? What happened?
Argh! Why are the workers sick?
I see you're not a vampire.
Ohh! I've been running for so long that I can't even breathe...
Everyone, come here and take the supply items in order!
Tu Pakas! This will be the end for you!
You shouldn't let your guard down in the middle of a battlefield.
I'll get the promotion no matter what!
I can't end it like this.
I can't die in a place like this!
Let's make some profit in safety while the investigators are here!/nHah! Don't you think it's a great idea?
I'm just a box./nPlease don't talk to me ever!
It's not fair! I said it's not fair!
I will trust no one from now on!
Ever since the Phantom Thief came here, the Blue Coral residents have been suspicious of each other.
What should I do? This is serious!
We're in this situation because of the Marinebees./nI can't forgive them!
Be careful! There are many Marinebees inside!
When the Marinebees come here, I'll kill them all!
Although I'm a guard, I can't fight.
There are a lot of people we can help in the Red Coral.
The Blue Coral Forest was a good town to live in when I was young. I know it's hard to believe now.
Aaah...There is another me inside me.../nWhere am I? I was originally... Not a Balaur
This machine looks like it stopped working a long time ago.
I see you have worked very hard swimming across the ocean all the way here. Weren't you attacked by Marinebees? I, Rudivari, the Queen of Seirens, welcome you with a song of friendship!/n
This is an old coffin emitting ominous energy.
I'm Kale! Straighten up! Keep your chin high! Open your eyes wide! You must be ready to fight with your enemy anytime, anywhere!/n
The Supply Team members always have a hard time.
The trees were once fresh and alive. What happened to them? How am I supposed to make a living from now on?
Oh boy! Working next to the fire makes me sweat!
Hello! Welcome to the Blue Coral Warehouse!
Get out of the way! That item belongs to me!
Do you really think anyone can find the Lime?
Argh!/nThose Kashans! I had no idea they would invade this place!
I'll tend to your wound so it won't hurt anymore.
We could have won if it hadn't been an ambush!/nI'm more ashamed than hurt.
I came to Mawenzi Hill only to find the troublesome Rinkees./nIf we get caught by the Turgas because of this there will be bloodshed in this place...
It looks like someone was dragged inside, but I couldn't help him.
The Rinkees are so frustrating!/nThey stole my diary!
The research shows that the Rinkees here seem to worship their ancestors.
The sudden appearances of the coconut forest and mutant Rinkees must have something to do with the blue light...
The Rinkees always try to steal everything they see. It's their nature.../nThat's why they stole our items...
I can't believe I'm trapped in a place like this! I should have been more careful!
I can't find it no matter how hard I look!
Not yet! You didn't cross the death line. You can't win like that.
I joined the battle because of my daughter, but I'm enjoying the fight.
There are some things that just don't work out the way you planned. Today's battle is one of them.
Some special Kashan characters are written on the Bulletin Board.
Aww... I can't cut down the trees because of the Crokies.
You have betrayed us! I'll use my power to make you pay!
Why is the road blocked like this?
Oh, my arms hurt! If they keep making us work like this, we won't be able to fight when the Keigers come!
We really didn't lie! Why won't Kale believe us?

You'll get your chance to win the gift only when you have collected enough Nysis Stars!/nFor more information, please visit Lime Odyssey Website. And while you're there, please take a look around and see what kinds of free gifts we have ready for you!/n/n How to obtain Nysis Stars/n: You'll get 1 Star for every 10 minutes you're logged in/n: In addition to this, you'll also have a chance to receive two more every 30 minutes. You'll get five between 16:00~17:00 and 19:00~20:00 everyday.

Oh, I'm drunk! Drunk!/n/nHiccup!/n/nI partip... particalu... particularly like the [Coral Wine] from the Blue Coral./nBut the merchant who sells it only opens his store from 6:00am to 10:am everyday! It's practically criminal! Would you buy me one if you have the time? Hiccup!
This is a Greenleaf service for adventurers.

The best way to become the most famous warrior in Orta is to master the use of your sword and shield. I know that very skill./nDo you want to learn?
The best way to become the most famous warrior in Orta is to master the use of your sword and shield. I know that very skill./nDo you want to learn?
The reason that your friends can battle enemies without having to look over their shoulders is because they know that we Clerics have their back./nWill you learn Healing Skills?
Nothing beats the rush of sneaking up behind your enemy in total darkness./nDo you want to learn that skill from me?
Though it may seem complex and mysterious, the key to learning magic is the ability to read the Mana in the air that's invisible to others./nDo you want me to teach you how to read the Mana Stream?

On the path of a warrior, you learn to respect the quality of your weapons above all else. Every hero who embarks on an adventure around here has my handiwork at their side! How about it?/nWill you learn the Blacksmith Skill from me then?

A dotted skirt yesterday, sleek two-tone vest today, and pretty Rabbit headdress for tomorrow.../nA tailor is happiest when he sees the grayish streets come to life with his colorful clothes!/nAnd you can have this pleasure if you learn some skills from me.
Nothing is more satisfying than preparing a hearty meal with rare ingredients for your companions./nLearn Chef Skills and you'll be welcome at any table!
The first step towards becoming the best warrior on the Orta Continent is to use your sword and shield as best you can. I can train you in this skill./nDo you want to learn?
Your friends can battle any foe when they know a skilled Cleric has their back./nWill you learn Healing Skills?
No enemy is safe when you can move unseen through the darkness./nDo you want to learn that skill from me?
Magic may seem complicated and difficult, but once you harness the power of the Mana in the air you'll never want to go back./nDo you want me to teach you how to read the Mana Stream?

Any fighter worth his salt will tell you that your sword and shield become an extension of yourself. That means the one thing every warrior really wants is high quality gear! How about it?/nWill you learn the Blacksmith Skill from me then?

Elegant dresses, dashing tunics, and accessories worth their weight in gold.../nA tailor is happiest when his customers are clamoring for his murchandise!/nAYou too can have this pleasure, if you learn some skills from me.
Everyone needs to eat sometime!/nLearn Chef Skills and you'll be a valuable asset wherever you go!
If you want to be the best warrior in the Orta Continent, you'll have to learn to use your sword and shield as effectively as you can. I know that very skill./nDo you want to learn?
Every good adventuring group has a skilled healer at it's center. Without us, they'd never make it out alive!./nWill you learn Healing Skills?
The best attack is the one they don't see coming. I can teach you to hide amongst the shadows and strike when the time is right!/nDo you want to learn that skill from me?
A warrior's arms and armor are his most prized possesion. Learn to make them, and you'll have a valuable skill for life! How about it?/nWill you learn the Blacksmith Skill from me then?
Take ordinary cloth, and turn it into works of art!/nA tailor is happiest when he gets paid to create a masterpiece./nYou can share in this joy if you learn some skills from me.
There's always hungry mouths to feed, and full pockets willing to pay for it./nLearn Chef Skills and you'll never go hungry OR poor!
You can't become a famous warrior if you can't use your sword and shield! Luckily, I know that very skill./nDo you want to learn?
A cleric provides an invaluable asset to any group. Ask anyone who's walked away from a fatal injury, and they'll say the same!/nWill you learn Healing Skills?
Once you learn to move in the shadows, your enemies will never see you coming./nDo you want to learn that skill from me?
Why buy generic weapons when you can create a masterpiece of your very own! How about it?/nWill you learn the Blacksmith Skill from me then?

Can't find the style of clothes you want? Make your own!/nA tailor is happiest when he sees the streets come to life with his artistic vision!/nAnd you too can have this pleasure if you learn some skills from me.
It's always easier to fight monsters with a good meal in ya!/nLearn Chef Skills and your friends will thank you for it!
A weapon you don't know how to use is a weapon that belongs to your enemy. Learning to use your sword and shield are vital to your survival./nDo you want to learn?
Learn to hide in the shadows and you'll be like a ghost amongst your enemies./nDo you want to learn that skill from me?
A team with a good cleric is a team that's twice as hard to beat!/nWill you learn Healing Skills?
The Mana all around us may be invisible to others, but you can harness it to cast powerful magic./nDo you want me to teach you how to read the Mana Stream?
Nothing's better than a hot forge and a hammer and anvil. Crafting weapons and armor is an artform as old as time! How about it?/nWill you learn the Blacksmith Skill from me then?

Always be in the latest trends, or create your own style and start a fashion revolution!/nA tailor is happiest when he sees the crowds wearing his work!/nYou too can have this pleasure, if you learn some skills from me.
There's nothing like a hearty meal after a long day of adventureing./nLearn Chef Skills and you'll be welcome around any campfire!

You can't have a healthy body without a healthy mind. The caming ritual of boiling water and the sweet aroma of tea is just the thing after a hard day./nYou too can have a healthy mind, if you learn Tea Ceremony Master Skills.
Do you need to repair a weapon? I can fix it to make it look as good as new./n

At last, I have a comprehensive listing of the Keigers currently stationed in Talunvara Canyon.
I'm positive that's where the Dark Energy is seeping out from.
This place is refusing me/nIs this the punishment for being alive?
I'll buy any specialties from the Shimmering Isle!
I'll buy any specialties from Al Sarvana!
I've heard blacksmiths can make powerful weapons and tough armor that'll protect you from the meanest monsters.
One of the blacksmiths I know can even make shields. They sure can bang out all kinds of gear, huh?
Tailoring requires delicate skills, since tailors have to turn cloth and leather into armor that can stand up in a fight.
The leather and fabric armor tailors make is very light. It's especially suited to those who want to move quickly, isn't it?
Chefs are great - they can cook up just the right thing to put people in good spirits.
Whether you're working or fighting, you need to eat, so you might as well eat food that really powers you up!
According to an old story, eating just a bite of the Lime fruit can make you immortal.
But /nI've also heard that Lime is the name of a sword that'll make its wielder an undefeatable warrior.
I've heard blacksmiths can make powerful weapons and tough armor that'll protect you from the meanest monsters.
One of the blacksmiths I know can even make shields. They sure can bang out all kinds of gear, huh?

The leather and fabric armor tailors make is very light. It's especially suited to those who want to move quickly, isn't it?
Chefs are great - they can cook up just the right thing to put people in good spirits.
Whether you're working or fighting, you need to eat, so you might as well eat food that really gives you extra energy!
I heard that if someone were to have some Lime, they could wipe out the Keiger troops singlehandedly!
If that's true, do you think Lime could be some kind of super ultra mega-cannon?
I've heard blacksmiths can make powerful weapons and tough armor that'll protect you from the meanest monsters.
One of the blacksmiths I know can even make shields. They sure can bang out all kinds of gear, huh?

The leather and fabric armor tailors make is very light. It's especially suited to those who want to move quickly, isn't it?
Chefs are great - they can cook up just the right thing to put people in good spirits.
If you get a chance to eat cheese made by a good chef, I'm sure you'd be brim-full with energy!
Lime? I've heard it's a mystic stone that can give you great powers. We should go on a journey to find it together - that's a very popular trend these days!
Really? /nI'm not all that interested in the Lime, but I'm always up for an adventure!
Come to think of it, how do blacksmiths know how to make all the weapons and armor they can make? /nWho taught them how to make it?

It's very simple! All you have to do is learn the crafting recipes from the Blacksmith Instructors in the towns. /nIt's so convenient compared to the days of years-long apprenticeships - just read a recipe and you'll remember how to make that item forever!
Even a simple cross-stitch is hard for me - how do Tailors make all those clothes? /n/nI know! Do you think I can get a drawing that shows me how to make each piece from the General Merchant?
You idiot, it's not a 'drawing', it's a recipe! /n And you buy them from the Tailoring Instructors, not from the General Merchants!
Ma'am, how can I learn how to cook?

Don't call me ma'am! II'm still far too young for that! /nJust call me by my name - I don't bite. /nIf you want to learn about cooking, go to the Chef Instructors in each town. But don't forget, 'cause I ain't gonna tell you twice.
I had a weird dream a few nights ago. /nIn my dream, I heard a voice asking me to find the Lime
Did you have the same dream? /nWho is this guy showing up in our dreams and asking us to find the Lime?

I keep hearing about Lime these days. /nWhat's that all about, anyway?
Soyou DID have the same dream I did, then. /nI have a bad feeling, like we've missed seeing something very important in all this

Didn't you have a strange dream? /nYou know, likedid you dream some girl asked you to find the Lime?
It sounds like an important sign telling us to go on an adventure! /nTime to pack our bags and go find the Lime!
It seems that advanced blacksmiths focus on making weapons or metal armor, and not both. Is that true?
It's true. /nI know this one blacksmith, and he ended up becoming a Weaponsmith so he could make the greatest swords ever.
One of my friends told me they were gonna become a Metalsmith. What do you know about that profession?
Wow, a Metalsmith? That means they'll be really good at making metal armors and shields. /nThey're guaranteed to gain a lot of warriors as friends, and those warriors will mean a thriving business.
Don't you think that tailor will lose some of his versatility if he becomes a Mercer and focuses only on cloth armor when he used to make leather armor too?
A loss? /nThe armor made my Mercers is high-quality and much in demand among Mages and Clerics! /nMercer-made clothes help their wearers to focus their mind, so they're always in demand.
I've heard that thieves like us are having a hard time because there aren't enough Leatherworkers around these days.
It makes sense, I suppose /nIt takes a lot of specialized skills to make leather armor that lets you move quickly and still has good protection.
I'll be a great epicurean when I grow up! /nIt's my dream to travel, and to eat all the world's delicious dishes!
Why not try the dishes made by a Master Chef? /nTheir meals manage to be both tasty AND healthy - that's the mark of high culinary training!
I feel like my mind is spacing out because I've been working too much lately.
If you're feeling the same, why not try a cup of tea made by a Tea Maker? /nI'm sure it'll help you relax and recover.
The Balaur said they're gonna retreive the power of the Lime as the inheritance of their race!
I can't believe you, spouting nonsense whenI just saved your hide from the Balaur! /nArgh, this is giving me a headache!
I want a weapon that's cooler and even more special than what I already have! /nButall the Weaponsmiths I know told me they don't know how to make something better than this.
How about you bring me some rare recipes from the dungeons? /nI've heard that some of the stuff you can find there would be a totally new item to the rest of the world.
I've heard that there are many mysterious items hidden away in Orta's dungeons. You think it's true?
Of course! I've heard that Metalsmiths drool over the recipes explorers find in dungeons. They can use them to make amazing gear!
My clothes help my focus a lot, but I always feel like they're too thin to protect me from monsters!
Sure, it's risky, but don't you think you should go to the dungeon to find better equipment? /nYou might get a rare recipe, or some high-quality fabric!
This leather armor is good, but it's not holding up for me recently because my adventures are taking me into increasingly-dangerous territory.
I've heard you can get some strong leather and rare recipes off monsters in dungeons. Not to pressure you or anything, but you really should get some of that stuff!
I've heard that some of the monsters living in dungeons possess cooking knowledge lost to modern civilization!
If that's true, I should get some recipes from them one of these days. /nI have no appetite for common food these days, you know.
It's really hard to get high-quality tea leaves, don't you think?
It's hard to get good materials in general, unless you go to places like dungeons, where the average person can't go.
I'm willing to join Nighog if I can obtain the Lime. /nThat Lime is gonna make me a lot of money, heh heh!
Sssssh! Those are dire words. /nDo you even know how dangerous they are?
When can I buy weapons made by a true Weapon smith? /nDo I need to go put in an order with one myself?
Please, just wait a bit longer. Making high-level weapons takes time, you know.
Wow! The armor here looks so sturdy! Andexpensive!
You have a good eye for equipment! /nAlthough it may not look like it, that's a special armor made by a Metalsmith who goes by the trade-name 'Death Defier'.
This fabric looks expensive. /nThis might be good enough to satisfy the demands of a Mercer. /nHow much for it?
A fine choice! /nThis bolt of fine cloth is available to you for the low, low price of 99,999 Silver, with our special monthly discount!
Hey! Are you saying that you've been selling my items at such low prices when I've been putting so much time into my Leatherworking mastery?
Hey! These are low level items you've made! /nIf you don't like it, why don't you go make some higher level leather armor?
I've heard that the food cooked at this inn is made by an expert Chef.
So, that's why the food was so extraordinary! /nIt's just one more reason to come here often (except for the strange lady over there).
I've already sold all my tea, because I made it with rare tea leaves.
Rare or not, my awesome salesmanship played a big role too.
A little while ago, a group of suspicious-looking mages passed by here.
I don't think they were with the Nighog, though. /nHard to tell if they were good or bad.
